title: Wierd Skin Unlocking - Champion Trade Glitch...
body:
So I queued up for ranked and picked heimerdinger to trade with my duo for Blitzcrank....

I didn't mess with anything skin related but when the game went to the loading screen where you see everyone's skin's etc I somehow had "Rusty Blitzcrank" equipped which I don't even own...

My duo had Alien Invader Heimerdinger selected but they somehow had the plain heimer skin equipped. Also there was coding where our name's should be.

In game I actually had Rusty Blitzcrank (I do not own this skin as much as I wish I did lol).  I should have taken a screenshot; I'm going to try to replicate it.

WTH?

UPDATE: here's a screenshot of me using Rusty Blitzcrank (I replicated the glitch by trading with my heimer duo again). I Don't own this skin.

http://i.imgur.com/W012eJU.png

replies.body:
Hey Touched by Blitz,

Thanks for reporting this! We're aware of this issue and are currently investigating.

I wish I could I tried taking one in the loading screen but I can't find it...so maybe you can't screenshot the loading screen lol. I'm going to try to replicate it and try taking one in game if i can do it again.
